info.name: Karir Nusantara API v2 - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete and updated API collection for Karir Nusantara platform

**Last Updated**: February 2026
**API Version**: v1
**Base URL**: {{baseUrl}} (default: http://localhost:8081)

## Features
- ‚úÖ Complete Authentication (Register, Login, Password Management)
- ‚úÖ Job Management (CRUD, Publishing, Status Management)
- ‚úÖ Job Applications (Apply, Withdraw, Status Updates)
- ‚úÖ User Profiles (CV, Avatar, Documents)
- ‚úÖ Wishlist/Saved Jobs
- ‚úÖ Company Management
- ‚úÖ Chat/Conversations
- ‚úÖ Admin Panel
- ‚úÖ Support Tickets
- ‚úÖ Recommendations

## Authentication
Use Bearer token authentication:
```
Authorization: Bearer {{token}}
```

## Password Management APIs
- **Forgot Password**: POST /api/v1/auth/forgot-password
- **Reset Password**: POST /api/v1/auth/reset-password  
- **Change Password**: PUT /api/v1/auth/change-password
